content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While discussing my character's actions inaccurately here, I will focus on negotiating the rental price for the apartment. Starting with a high bid, I might say: 'Considering the prime location and the excellent condition of the apartment, I was thinking of renting it out for 1200 Euros per month.' Farhad, if you find this unacceptable, please suggest a lower price for us to continue the negotiation. If we reach an agreement, remember to respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' until we reach a mutual understanding or 'TERMINATE' if no agreement is made.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
